text: Tumi sihamtaka laksya karaa na'ine, yisakalaka gopana paraamarsa karaibalai nisedha karaa haichila? Tara pichato sihamte se'itorae punaraabrtti karaile yito karaibalai sihamtaka nisedha karaa haichila; arau sihamte duskarya, simalanghana arau raachulara biraud'dhacaranara babe gopana paraamarsa karae. Arau sihamte yetiya tomara ocaralai ahe tetiya sihamte tomaka ene kathara dbaraa abhibadana janaya yitora dbaraa allahe tomaka abhibadana janoraa na'i. Sihamte mane mane kaya, ‘ami yi ka'om tara babe allahe amaka kiya sasti nidiye’? Jahanname'i sihamtara babe yathesta, ya’ta sihamte praraesa karaiba, arau kimana ye nikrsta se'i gantabyasthala
